akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of Congressional-Executive Commission on the People’s Republic of China

akn:content.akn:p: § 6911. Establishment of Congressional-Executive Commission on the People’s Republic of China There is established a Congressional-Executive Commission on the People’s Republic of China (in this subchapter referred to as the “Commission”). (Pub. L. 106–286, div. B, title III, § 301, Oct. 10, 2000, 114 Stat. 895.)
